评论概述: These smelled like dead rotted fish heads
评论详情: I ordered these for a gothic themed Halloween costume. They were super cute and a great price for a one time wear. But I couldn’t use them because they REAKED as soon  as they came out of the bag. And the odor lingered on my hands even after I took them off. I left them out in direct sun, no help. Neither was deodorizers or a trip through the dryer. And I am NOT a person who is sensitive to smells. My husband wouldn’t even let me wear them with my costume because the smell was noticeable even several feet away. Because of the aforementioned washing and time outside I could not return these but please, please do not buy. They are unusable.
